item.title: 28 - Implement strStr() (KMP Algorithm)
item.description: leetcode Problem Implement strStr(). Return the index of the first occurrence of needle in haystack, or -1 if needle is not part of haystack. Example 1: Input: haystack = "hello", needle = "ll" Output: 2 Example 2: Input: haystack = "aaaaa", needle = "bba" Output: -1 Solution KMP tutorial class Solution: def __init__(self, pat): self.pat = pat self.dp = [] self.KMP(self.pat) def KMP(self, pat): M = len(pat) self.dp = [[0] * 256 for _ in range(M)] self.
